category.title: Innovation Design Site
category.description: Name the innovation - where was it designed? Who designed it? How did the design process happen?

category.title: Innovation Manufacturing site
category.description: Name the innovation - where is it made? If possible, how is it made? Who makes it?

category.title: Innovation Distribution Site
category.description: Name the innovation - who's using it and where is it being used? Feel free to add more information - how is it being used? What is its impact?
